item.title: [Getpass] Error
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I madet this code, but why i can’t get pass of offline players. ?

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“MaTT”) && (command.startsWith(“getpass”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					sM("Succesful password recovery!");
					sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
				} else {
					sM("Error getting password.");
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sM("Use ::getpass playername");
			}
	}[/code]

Read full topic
